TEAM.TEXT1: Imagine the following scenario: Three students sitting together late at night, racking their brains about why there is no one actually using an EU-wide solution for the digital green passport. Suddenly, one of the three says,
TEAM.TEXT2: "Yeah, let's make a great app for that!"
TEAM.TEXT3: No sooner said than done. Numerous sleepless nights and countless caffeinated drinks later, we are proud to present you the final result:
TEAM.TEXT7: As an interdisciplinary and international (2 Austrians and 1 German 😉) team we - Jakob Stadlhuber (
TEAM.TEXT7f: Student) from the University of Applied Sciences Hagenberg - have created a project in a very short time, with the goal to
TEAM.TEXT9: for the whole European Union. We hope that we can make the lives of some people at least a little bit easier in the currently very difficult time!
TEAM.TEXT10: You have questions to us as a team? Feel free to contact us:

IMPRINT.HEADLINE: Imprint
IMPRINT.TEXT1: This project is an open source project and can therefore be further developed and maintained by the community. The entire source code of the app and this website can be viewed in this GitHub repository:
IMPRINT.TEXT2: The project was initiated by the following persons in cooperation with the FH Upper Austria. Responsible for the existing concept, the design as well as the content of the app and this website are:

EXCERPT.TEXT1: Especially when dealing with health data, data protection plays a particularly important role. Since data protection and transparency are very important to us, the entire source code of the project is publicly available
EXCERPT.TEXT4: You can use the app and this website without any personal data being stored or processed online. The collected data is only stored and processed
EXCERPT.TEXT5: locally and offline on your device
EXCERPT.TEXT6: and will be deleted when you uninstall the app. When using certain optional Apple Wallet features, personal data is collected and stored and processed online for the shortest possible period of time. Of course, you will be informed about this in the app before using these features.

APP.QUESTION: Which data is collected when using the app?
APP.ANSWER1: All data (certificates including first and last name, date of birth, and certificate-specific health data such as vaccine or time of test execution) is stored and processed locally and offline on your device, with the exception of these optional features:
APP.ANSWER5: New public keys of the respective EU states and any other connections are transmitted encrypted via HTTPS.
APP.ANSWER7: For technical reasons, the certificate must be verified and signed on our server for a short time and is then deleted again. No data is stored for longer periods of time.
APP.ANSWER8: Your data will be stored in a PassKit file for use in Apple Wallet. Please note that once saved, it may be synced via Apple iCloud (cloud service). You can read more about Apple's privacy policy here:
APP.ANSWER11: In order to be able to share the certificate status with other people, a part of the certificate data has to be stored temporarily online. This is only the absolutely necessary information that is persisted for a period of time that you can choose. All data will be deleted at the latest after the expiration of the particular shared certificate. The data will neither be processed nor passed on to third parties.
APP.ANSWER12: To provide transparency on how your data is processed and stored, the entire source code of the project is publicly available here:
APP.ANSWER14: Here is an overview of what data is stored online for a certain period of time when you use the Share feature:
APP.DATA3: Self-selected expiration date or expiration date of the certificate
APP.DATA7: Date of first and last vaccination
APP.ML_KIT_BODY: To ensure fast and reliable scanning of QR codes, Google's ML Kit package is used. When using this package, diagnostic data is provided to Google to improve the scanning function; it is important here that no personal data or certificate data is provided. All detailed information about ML Kit is summarized here:

WEBSITE.QUESTION: Which data is collected when using this website?
WEBSITE.ANSWER1: The server operator of this website processes data that is necessary for the delivery of the website. IP addresses are anonymized by means of masking. More about this in the privacy policy of the operator.
WEBSITE.ANSWER3: such as Google Analytics are used.
WEBSITE.ANSWER5: This website uses the hosting service Uberspace. This service provider creates web server logs that contain the date and time, the URL path accessed, the referrer if applicable, and the browser used; however, your IP address is anonymized using IP masking so that no personal data is available. More about the privacy policy of Uberspace can be found here:

THIRDPARTIES.QUESTION: Will my data be passed on to third parties?
THIRDPARTIES.ANSWER: No, your data will not be passed on to third parties.

RIGHTS.QUESTION: What rights do I have as a person affected?
RIGHTS.ANSWER1: You have the right to information about your personal data, as well as the right to rectification, erasure or restriction of processing. You can also object to the processing and have the right to have your personal data transferred in a structured, machine-readable form. For all the aforementioned rights, please contact the responsible persons of this project, the contact details can be found in the
RIGHTS.ANSWER3: of this website. You also have the right to file a complaint with a supervisory authority. For Austria, this is the Austrian Data Protection Authority, Wickenburggasse 8, 1080 Vienna, phone:

HEADVISUAL.ANDROID: Get GreenPass on Android and iOS right now:
HEADVISUAL.BETA: Already testing the beta version on iOS:
HEADVISUAL.TEXT: Download now, add QR code and show your vaccination, health and test certificates digitally throughout the EU.

STEP1.HEADLINE: Add your QR Codes
STEP1.TEXT: Simply scan the QR code of your vaccination, test and recovery certificates

STEP2.HEADLINE: All certificates in one app
STEP2.TEXT: Collect all certificates of your family and friends in your GreenPass app

STEP3.HEADLINE: Show & validate GreenPass
STEP3.TEXT: Present and validate in one app? GreenPass makes it possible: One app for everything!

SECTION1.PREHEADER: The app that can do it all:
SECTION1.TEXT: With the GreenPass App it is possible to show your own certificates as well as to validate those of others in the whole European Union. This makes GreenPass the ideal solution for restaurant owners and club leaders!

SECTION2.PREHEADER: Collecting documents has come to an end:
SECTION2.TEXT: With GreenPass, it is possible to carry multiple certificates in one app. For example, parents can also store their children's certificates in the GreenPass app and save collecting multiple documents.

SECTION3.PREHEADER: The solution for restaurant owners and club leaders:
SECTION3.TEXT: The regulations from when and for how long vaccination, test, recovery certificates are valid in individual EU countries vary from country to country and change regularly. With GreenPass you have the possibility to validate other people's certificates according to the regulations of your country*.
SECTION3.SUBTEXT: *Currently only an international version for the EU, Austria and Germany are supported, we are currently working in full speed to implement the current regulations of all EU countries.

SECTION4.PREHEADER: Never again screenshots and photos of test results:
SECTION4.TEXT: At soccer practice, the singing rehearsal or the neighbor's barbecue party: COVID certificates often needs to be presented ahead of time. With GreenPass it is possible to share your certificate with other people via a link.

SECTION5.TEXT: With just one click, it is possible to add your own certificate to the Apple Wallet and thus also present it with the Apple Wallet and the Apple Watch.

SECTION6.TEXT1: You can use the app without any data being stored online. All your data is stored and processed
SECTION6.TEXT2: locally and encrypted on your device only.
SECTION6.TEXT3: Personal data will only be collected when using optional Apple Wallet feature and stored online for the shortest necessary period of time.
SECTION6.TEXT4: We ask you to read our short

FAQ_DATA.QUESTION: Which data is collected by the app?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER1: All data (certificates consisting of first and last name, date of birth, and certificate-specific health data) is stored and processed exclusively
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER2: locally and offline on your device
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER3: , with the exception of the optional "Apple Wallet" feature. You can find all information on data protection summarized as compactly as possible in our

FAQ_FEEDBACK.QUESTION: You have questions, suggestions or wishes?
FAQ_FEEDBACK.ANSWER: Contact us, we welcome feedback and suggestions to continuously improve this project! Here you can get to our contact:

FAQ_CONTRIBUTE.QUESTION: You want to participate in the project?
FAQ_CONTRIBUTE.ANSWER: The GreenPass app is an open source project. This means that anyone can view the code and participate in the project. We look forward to expanding and improving the GreenPass app with as many people as possible! You can access our Github repository here:

FAQ_ANYMORE.QUESTION: You have another question that is not answered here?
FAQ_ANYMORE.ANSWER: Contact us! We are looking forward to answering your questions:
